title: Cup
description: A schema for Cup's config file

agent.description: Whether or not to enable agent mode. When agent mode is enabled, the server only exposes the API and the web interface is unavailable.

extra.description: Extra image references you want Cup to check

exclude.description: Image references that should be excluded from the check

refresh_interval.description: The interval at which Cup should check for updates. Must be a valid cron expression. Reference: https://github.com/Hexagon/croner-rust#pattern

authentication.description: An authentication token provided by the registry

insecure.description: Whether Cup should connect to the registry insecurely (HTTP) or not. Enable this only if you really need to.

ignore.description: Whether or not the registry should be ignored when running Cup

socket.description: The path to the unix socket you would like Cup to use for communication with the Docker daemon. Useful if you're trying to use Cup with Podman.

servers.description: Additional servers to connect to and fetch update data from

theme.description: The theme used by the web UI
